Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Western (FP). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Western (FP).

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
